description: Keep your options open for spontaneous adventures - with High Coast Hike Trousers you are always ready for an outing in your kayak or other after work activity when the weather is good. Made from comfortable stretch fabric that dries fast if you unexpectedly get wet, and with a simple style that works well both in the terrain and at summer barbeques.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Hike Trousers, Long - Mens
